name: Kindom Questions
description:
So this is my entry. i know it isnt much but it was all i had time for.

i planed from the beginning that is was ment for the compo but i didnt have time to

get it finnish becasue of school and stuff :/. but i dont have anymore time now anyways

so here it is hope you enjoy and tell my your feedback of what you think and if you find

any problems with it just tell me and ill try to fix them :)

And if there is any intresst ill be posting updates of the game at my twitter :P @thesandwithlife

I WILL UPDATE THE GAME AND ALL THE BUGS IF THERE IS AND INTRESST xD

---- And also i didnt have time to put in the sounds for the game :/-----------

Info:

Time Spent on this project: 24hours

is it done?: NOPE

will i continue with it?: if there is an instresst :)
